commentaries.bbcode: [b]50 for Gautam Gambhir[/b]
[b]Dropped![/b] Four! A lucky way to go to 50! Gambhir fizzes a straight drive through the hands of Harbhajan and it still makes the fence. He is leading his team to victory with this innings

message.text: Dropped! Four! A lucky way to go to 50! Gambhir fizzes a straight drive through the hands of Harbhajan and it still makes the fence. He is leading his team to victory with this innings

commentaries.autoText: J Bumrah to G Gambhir, %SPEED% full length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Gambhir anticipates the full delivery and picks his spot over mid on. Clever placement from the KKR skipper

message.text: Four! Gambhir anticipates the full delivery and picks his spot over mid on. Clever placement from the KKR skipper

commentaries.bbcode: J Bumrah to G Gambhir, [b]WICKET!!! G Gambhir is out[/b] c Ambati Rayudu b Jasprit Bumrah
commentaries.autoText: J Bumrah to G Gambhir, WICKET!!! G Gambhir is out c Ambati Rayudu b Jasprit Bumrah

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Mumbai Indians get a much needed wicket! The ball gets big on Gambhir who looked to pull to leg, it takes his top edge and picks out the fielder at deep square leg. The men in blue need more of that!

message.text: Wicket! Mumbai Indians get a much needed wicket! The ball gets big on Gambhir who looked to pull to leg, it takes his top edge and picks out the fielder at deep square leg. The men in blue need more of that!

commentaries.bbcode: J Bumrah to S Yadav, %SPEED% good length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: J Bumrah to S Yadav, %SPEED% good length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]A flick of the wrists and lofted, up and over square leg. He has a lovely flow of the bat with that stroke, marvelous to watch!

message.text: Six! A flick of the wrists and lofted, up and over square leg. He has a lovely flow of the bat with that stroke, marvelous to watch!

commentaries.bbcode: Malinga showing why he is one of the best death bowlers in the world, just two from the over and it takes us to a timeout. We are in for a great finish here in Kolkata with the Knight Riders needing 9.50 runs per over... who will win?

message.text: Malinga showing why he is one of the best death bowlers in the world, just two from the over and it takes us to a timeout. We are in for a great finish here in Kolkata with the Knight Riders needing 9.50 runs per over... who will win?
